sections.title: 1. Payment Terms and Billing
sections.content: Payments must be made according to the terms agreed upon in the project contract. Pink Ponk reserves the right to request a 50% deposit before starting any work. The remaining balance must be settled upon project completion, prior to final delivery. In case of non-compliance:
items: A 5% additional fee will be applied for each week of delay.
Pink Ponk may suspend or cancel the project until pending payments are made.

sections.title: 2. Warranty and Support Policy
sections.content: We offer free technical support for a period of 30 days after project delivery. Any additional requests will be considered as a maintenance service and will be subject to extra charges. The warranty does not apply in the following cases:
items: Modifications made by third parties without our consent.
Failures resulting from external issues, such as servers or hosting providers.

sections.title: 3. Dispute Resolution Policy
sections.content: In the event of a dispute, both parties agree to attempt to resolve the conflict through mediation. If no solution is reached, the dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of Monterrey, Nuevo Le√≥n.

sections.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: We use cookies to enhance user experience and analyze site usage. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. For more information, see our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 5. Cancellation Policy
sections.content: Cancellations must be notified in writing at least 7 days in advance. If the work has already begun, the deposit will be retained as compensation for initial costs. Refunds will not be issued for work already delivered.

sections.title: 6. Accessibility Statement
sections.content: We are committed to ensuring that our site is accessible to everyone, including those with disabilities. If you have difficulty accessing our content, please contact us at: contact@pinkponk.lol.

sections.title: 7. Service Updates and Changes
sections.content: Pink Ponk reserves the right to modify its services, prices, or legal terms. Any changes will be notified through our website at least 30 days in advance.

sections.title: 8. Legal Disclaimer
sections.content: Pink Ponk does not guarantee specific results derived from the use of our services. The client is responsible for properly implementing our recommendations and keeping the website updated.

sections.title: 9. Acknowledgments and Third-Party Licenses
sections.content: This site uses third-party tools and resources that are subject to their own licenses. See the corresponding links for more details.
